title: Tyler1 Banning

embed.description: Hey all, Instant Feedback catches the most unsportsmanlike players in League, but some people go out of their way to continue ruining games for the community. Because of a well-documented history of account bans for verbal abuse, intentional feeding, as well as account sharing/purchasing, evasion of sportsmanship systems, and player harassment, we will not allow Tyler1 to hold a League of Legends account, indefinitely.

replies.body: lol so tyler was leveling his account from level 1 by himself on stream, and when other players come into his champ select and troll him he still plays the game despite them being retards.. and hes the one getting banned? Good job Riot Games

>  If riots going to ban this guy, they have to do it to every toxic player. If they can't find a way to, Tyler doesn't deserve the ban.

Perhaps you could think of it this way. "If the police are going to arrest this guy for theft, they have to arrest all thieves. If they can't find a way to, this person should not be arrested."

Just because the police cannot catch every single thief, or maybe chooses to let some off for a first time offense, doesn't mean it's not a crime. Just because they cannot catch all thieves, does not mean that x serial thief should not be arrested.

his reforming i dont see why you would perm ban him. lmao his less toxic and is improving everyday. gg tyler fking 1.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Do police attend crime scenes and focus on only crimes that are massive press acts?

Cause that's mainly what riot does, and this one backfired like a bitch, because again he was reforming (sure he got 18 jail sentences, but once he gets out from one, you don't just arrest someone on the spot for nothing.)

I'd rather they focus only on massive press acts than none at all, and we can't really assume riot doesn't do anything because they don't want to, in fact, we can't even assume riot does nothing, they just don't announce every single ban.

 As for Tyler's specific case, I don't hold an opinion either way.

>we can't even assume riot does nothing, they just don't announce every single ban.

Lets face it, if they did do things, Oceania would be a small server.
Oceania IS a small server (or toxic people just hate normals)

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cOoyAYJJ,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-04-30T12:12:18.320+0000)

They get a criminal record and the next time they do something it becomes a lot worse for them. Same like this he has had so many accounts banned and they have all piled up and everyone consider his a toxic troll that needs to be banned. and no one cares if he is reforming yeah he lasted 14 days without a ban but hay look another 2 accounts since that 1st ban has been banned for verbal abuse or unsportsmanlike aka. Trolling or toxicity. Hate people that support toxic streamers and blame others for them speaking the truth you all should be sad that you are letting someone so toxic get away with it and deem riot the bad ones in the situation!
A criminal record doesn't mean you can be put in jail for doing nothing after having got out of jail (outside of corrupt cops)

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cOoyAYJJ,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-30T13:45:36.184+0000)
>
> A criminal record doesn't mean you can be put in jail for doing nothing after having got out of jail (outside of corrupt cops)

Did i say that no, What i implied was if they ended up doing the same crime or found committing another crime its on their record forever you can't get away from it and that can be hold against you when going for certain things but this has nothing to do with league but it works similar way.

Riot is sick of this one toxic player that has had over 18+ don't know how many accounts can even count how many chances he's had and you as well as others defend him saying his "becoming a better man" don't give bull shit you guys had a fun time watching him getting banned and being toxic and quite frankly these are little kids that don't know anything that say his a "lad" maybe when they grow out of their immaturity they will find this is a fair ban that has been held against tyler 1. 

Don't say anything else you are one of these people that like the ruin boards and create this argument over little things. he was 110% a toxic player reformed or not after 18+ accounts you would think that they would know better. all hell you guys are complaining about other toxic players but these people don't go to the extent and STREAM it for everyone around the world to watch and this has gotten the attention of riot he is making a living off their game by disobeying the Rules that Riot has put in place to keep this game a better "non toxic game".

Just so we are clear (because this clearly isn't getting through to anyone i have talked to about this subject)

I AM NOT SAYING TYLER WAS IN THE RIGHT THIS IS NOT A DEFENSE OF TYLER.

I am simply pointing out how pathetic a showing this is from riot themselves, and how they tried to (quite pathetically i might add) use a reforming banned player (as a note, he hadn't been toxic at any point on this account) which IS WHAT RIOT IS AIMING TO DO WITH THEIR BAN SYSTEM I MIGHT ADD, to make a shitty statement to players that this "isn't ok"

While they are right and Tyler wasn't doing the right thing, the way this was handled was pathetic for multiple reasons.

1. This should have been done way before 18 accounts.
2. This shouldn't be being done to someone who is actually showing signs of reform.
3. This shouldn't be a press statement, fuck riot try to hide the fact that people take bans, one person who had been a troll/massive rager shouldn't be made a post about when things like no name and shame, and similar things are around to stop people calling out other people.

This is me pointing out that Riot is handling this like shit and should be looked at some more for this sort of an action, and hell even riot know they fucked up, why do you think no riot member has actually said anything about this?

no offense but even if you say 'not a defense of tyler' you sound like a butthurt fan just trying to hate on rito... 
Instead of looking at it as if they needed to ban him 18 accounts earlier look at them being so merciful that they gave him 18 chances to reform... they even fucking said it was their bad and their mistake for not banning him earlier, so calm the fuck down.

They made it a press conference because they are making an example of him in hopes all of the other people who are toxic in games will be abit more fearful since riot do look into toxicity as a bannable offense.

Naming and shaming is allowed for riot... especially AFTER having banned someone who is GUILTY of the offense, the difference on the forums is the people are naming and shaming people who havent been proven guilty and that could hurt their acc.

TYLER WAS A SAVAGE DICKHEAD WHO GOT WHAT HE DESERVED.

the only thing riot did wrong was wait so long, everything else is warranted and honestly i wish they even shamed him further, the guy openly said he saw it coming, his a toxic person who pray to god gets banned so many times in the future that he just gives up on league all together.

Oh and btw... if you were actually watching his stream he wasnt anywhere near 'REFORMED' the %%%% was still flaming people, griefing and being passive agressive, no idea where people get their kicks from saying 'he was reforming'. You dont reform after 18 banned accounts... and youre an idiot if you honestly think he was going to reform.

The kid shoots roids up his ass... the guy suffers from roid rage 24/7

>if you were actually watching his stream he wasnt anywhere near 'REFORMED' the %%%% was still flaming people, griefing and being passive agressive, no idea where people get their kicks from saying 'he was reforming'.

How recently had you actually watched his stream?

Because recently he had been being trolled and doing nothing IN GAME about it, calling them idiots on twitch doesn't constitute a ban on league.

If that was the case, i'd probably be banned on league for what i say in teamspeak.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cOoyAYJJ,comment-id=000400000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-30T16:39:26.143+0000)

Why make this post you make it more clear to people that you like to point out stupid shit and to be honest its now over everything Reddit, Twitch even the boards EVERYONE trying to unban this toxic player!
 
18+!!!!! ACCOUNTS 18!!!!!!!!!!! is that not a big number of banned accounts and he just keeps coming back and keeps deciding to be the same if its 2 days 6 days or 14 days he just always finds a way to become toxic/troller and Riot hasn't fucked up.

I'm not mainly saying this to you I'm saying to everyone that follows this guy and the 184 people that have seen this post that this is a fair ban.

>18+!!!!! ACCOUNTS 18!!!!!!!!!!! is that not a big number of banned accounts

There are people with more, the difference being that one streams and is high elo, the others don't stream and are low elo.

I'm not at all disputing the ban, just the way it was done, had it been done during his last ban, then sure all aboard the ban train.

However, this ban was done after a new account was made AND leveled to 30.

It's not like a short amount of time passed before riot actually did anything.

This is one of the very few times I will comment on here ever.

Also MA15+ warning on language below. It's the only time I will use this and the only time I have from this point on. Ban me if you will it only backs up my argument.

This is actually total **f**ucking **b**ullshit. Absolutely despicable of Riot. Within 2 weeks 2 of the most interesting and entertaining league personalities have been banned in some manner, (gross gore and now tyler1) for none other authentic reason than that they are disliked by either Riot or pro player(s). Legit C9 **c**unteos makes a video that hits the front page of reddit, containing him bitching about tyler 1 when he himself is a double crossing dummy spitting hypocritical toxic shitter himself. Literally 24 hours later tyler1 is hit with an *indefinite* ban on any of his accounts instantly uppon identification.

What horseshit is this? And one of the reasons the NA red listed on the post to these cancerous boards included "purchasing of accounts" which is complete and utter hogwash. Tyler1 leveled that account on stream, as he did for all the other accounts.

It's so fucking hilarious. Pretty much all of the games tyler played on his new account, he tryharded in. If he got toxic people on his team that might set him off, he'd insta mute all. He never ran down mid. He even got an intentional feeder heimer in one of his games, and you know what? Tyler played it all the way through. 
Yes on stream he raged a bit, got upset. But he never did anything banworthy in the game.

Now yes. Tyler1 does have a dirty track record for toxicity. That's obvious and I'm not going to deny it, it's what he is known for. But xj9ing him is preposterously stupid and the wrong way to go about it.

Riot is so sissy when it comes to toxicity. Some **c**unt can threaten to troll in champ select and force a dodge.
No punishment...
Someone can afk from minute1 or after getting first blooded.
Little longer wait for queing up...
Intentionally feeding down a lane.
Maybe a temp ban or warning...
This one is the fucking cherry on the cake. Afks and intentional feeders are what ruin gameplay. This is what has a proven and definite impact on game outcome yet goes lightly under the corrupt hammer of Riot.

Tyler1 may be toxic yes, but he is good at the game. All of his accounts have been levelled from level 1 all the way to high diamond/masters and even in some rare cases challenger. Yes Tyler1 has intentionally fed before. Granted. But he has improved lately.

Setting aside from league, Tyler1 is the only interesting league streamer. All the top viewed streams on twitch are pros, same old boring ass shit. I can't stand watching some retired pro or pinply faced teen for more than 10 minutes. Maybe imaqtpie is an exception. But Tyler1 has a personality. He connected with his audience. He was fun to watch...

If Riot and twitch can sit back and let %%%got mongoloids like kayceytron stream league without  permanant/indefinite ban, then how the fuck can they justify banning Tyler. Nah because tyler1 is actually good at the game and a real personality that makes it unacceptable. No pro player has had to deal with a kaycetron in their game, but tyler1 is good enough to catch up to their 5 man dynamic cancer queuing asses and effect their games. Then they have a sook on reddit and a suck on riot, then this shit happens accordingly.

The Tyler1 that streamed today was in no way worthy of a ban. Some of his teammates however definitely were eligible. But they are nobodies. They don't stream, they aren't well known, so who the fuck cares if they are toxic or troll gamed right?

Not fucking Riot.

I despise playing this game in its current state in season 6. This is the least fun I've ever had playing league in 3 years and shit like this is making me despise not only the game, but Riot too.

TL;DR...
Ban is stupid. Tyler1 definitely did not deserve this type of ban. Meteos is a %%%got. Riot are cucks that bow down to money and pro players. Goodbye.

grossgore was wrong mate... he deserved that ban, it wasnt his first one either and despite what you think making up lies like that about a caster who is in the spotlight alot for his job can ruin his career... and no matter what job he was in he would of gotten fired for making up lies like that. Twitch is also an organisation that dont want people working under them that give them a bad name AKA TYLER 1 AND GROSSGORE.

Tyler1 was promoting toxicity... i mean he has been banned on like 18+ accounts for toxicity... that is 18 signs the guy is a toxic dooshbag. Grossgore just sipped up, and if you want to be a professional at what you do you cant afford to fuck up that badly...

Meteos has been in the league scene for a long time, same with krepo but they arent the reasons gg and tyler got banned, they got banned for being %%%%s, and saying the wrong stuff.

Your opinion is extremely biast and youre facts are over exadurated, maybe watch less streams and play the game more then, i mean if watching someone being toxic ingame is what gets you off or is 'entertaining' for you then you have some wierd sadistic shit going on that you need to get checked out. Go watch bjerg stream his funny as hell, teaches you alot about the game and absolutely dominates his games

Tell me who else has made over 20+ accounts and every single one has been permanently banned for verbal abuse or unsportsmanlike conduct also he's major toxic on streams when playing League of Legends he deserved to get banned from making more accounts he ruins the League community!
Ps. he is only a streamer by getting popular from TOXIC behaviour
Out of all the things, this is the worst thing riot has done! Tyler had a twitch account and his attitude was improving! Whyyy{{champion:119}} {{item:3070}}
Who?

they try to do it to every player, but it takes time.
its much easier when they feed and troll on stream though.
